sentence.Network_en: For the movie business, it was all downhill from there.
sentence.Network_cn: 电影业从那时就开始完全走下坡路了。

sentence.Network_en: Since I started to work longer hours things have gone steadily downhill.
sentence.Network_cn: 自从我开始加班以来，事情日趋恶化。

sentence.Network_en: Bessie was on the downhill path.

...冬季奥运会上，列支敦士登超过挪威、德国、意大利等传统强国，进入奖牌榜前六名。列支敦士登总共夺得9枚奖牌（都是高山滑雪（downhill skiing）项目）11旅游编辑民俗列支敦士登人的外貌和生活习惯与邻国瑞士或奥地利蒂罗尔州的山民相差无几。男子着细毛呢帽、短上衣和紧身裤，妇女爱穿深皱格的连衣裙，戴一种很别致的帽子。假日列支敦士登.

lj.lj_ly: the business is going downhill fast.

encyclopedia.content: 高山速降车”，英文叫做DOWNHILL(简称DH)。DH是从山地车族里分离出来的车型，比所谓的山地自行车要高两个档次，作为一种以刺激、惊险著称的终极运动，很早以前在一些欧美国家就相当盛行。这类车前叉很高，车体沉重，制动性能优越，拥有超强的抗震系统，对山路的崎岖和陡峭有极强的适应能力，但比较笨重，对车手的体能要求较高。一般先用缆绳把车拉上山，然后从山上高速向下骑行，体验极速带来的刺激。这种玩法极具挑战性——驾着速

entry.def: If something or someone is moving downhill or is downhill, they are moving down a slope or are located towards the bottom of a hill.

example.ex: He headed downhill towards the river...
The lake itself lies only a few hundred yards off to your right and slightly downhill...
example.tran: 湖本身就在你右侧仅几百码的地方，稍微向山下走几步。

entry.tran: 走下坡路地;恶化地;每况愈下
entry.def: If you say that something is going downhill, you mean that it is becoming worse or less successful.

example.ex: Since I started to work longer hours things have gone steadily downhill...
example.tran: 自从我开始加班以来，事情日趋恶化。

example.ex: For the movie business, it was all downhill from there...
example.tran: 电影业从那时就开始完全走下坡路了。

entry.def: If you say that a task or situation is downhill after a particular stage or time, you mean that it is easy to deal with after that stage or time.

example.ex: Well, I guess it's all downhill from here.
example.tran: 嗯，我猜从此以后就容易了。

means.word_mean: 1. the downward slope of a hill
2. a ski race down a trail
1. toward a lower or inferior state;

sentences.sentence: "your performance has been going downhill for a long time now"

means.word_mean: 2. toward the bottom of a hill;

sentences.sentence: "running downhill, he gained a lot of speed"

example.zh: 一切都不可避免地趋向恶化。

auth_sentence.content: Downhill can be something to aim at for later.
auth_sentence.res_content: Downhill can be something to aim at for later.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Downhill can be something to aim at for later.

auth_sentence.content: The last eight years we've been going downhill.
auth_sentence.res_content: The last eight years we've been going downhill.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The last eight years we've been going downhill.

auth_sentence.content: They're not happy, and shit rolls downhill.
auth_sentence.res_content: They're not happy, and shit rolls downhill.

sentences.en: Heading away from the mountains,I soon found an easier path leading downhill to the village.
sentences.cn: 我背着山走了不久,就发现了一条通往该村比较平坦的下山小路。

means.word_mean: (与前面的困难相比较)容易得多

sentences.en: It’s all downhill from here. We’ll soon be finished.
sentences.cn: 这以后就容易了，我们很快就会结束。

sentences.en: I’ve done three out of the four parts of the course, so it should be downhill all the way from now on.
sentences.cn: 我已经完成了课程的四分之三，这以后应该会容易多了。

sentences.en: I took on far too much work and after that it was downhill all the way for my health.
sentences.cn: 那段时间我的工作太繁忙了，从那以后我的身体状况迅速恶化。

means.word_mean: 每况愈下；走下坡路；恶化

sentences.cn: 西方社会是在走下坡路吗?

sentences.en: My work has been going downhill ever since my divorce.
sentences.cn: 自从离婚后我的工作就每况愈下。

sentences.en: This restaurant has definitely gone downhill since I last came here.
sentences.cn: 从我上次来过之后，这家餐馆越来越糟。
